text: nampi unkalitam oppataikkappatta amanitankalai avarrin contakkararkalitam ninkal oppuvittu vitaventumenrum, manitarkalitaiye tirppu kurinal niyayamakave tirppuk kurutal ventum enrum unkalukku niccayamaka allah kattalaiyitukiran;. Niccayamaka allah unkalukku (itil) mikavum ciranta upatecam ceykiran;. Niccayamaka allah (yavarraiyum) ceviyuruvonakavum, parppavanakavum irukkinran
